concept.title: USAFA PGI 5307.104-92 Acquisition Strategy Panel (ASP) and Acquisition Plan (AP) Approval Authority

li.p: (a)(6) See the USAFA SDO assignments for ASPs for Services in USAFA PGI 5337.503-90 . For ASPs for Supplies, the USAFA SCO delegates ASP Authority (Supplies) to the COCO for actions < $10M.

(b)(1) The USAFA SCO delegates Acquisition Plan Approval Authority (Services) to the COCO for actions < $10M. Contracting Officers should refer to the USAFA/PK authorities and delegations site concerning specific COCO designations, delegations and authorities at https://cs2.eis.af.mil/sites/13093/PP/USAFA_PK/_layouts/15/start.aspx#/SitePages/Home.aspx .
